Each year, Geauga County Job & Family Services hosts Help Me Learn Day, a school supply distribution program for low-income Geauga County families. Last year, the program served about 500 kids from all school districts.

Although the program will look different this year, JFS is committed to helping kids be prepared for the upcoming school year. Registration will take place the month of July. The last day to register is July 31, 2020, and the curbside pickup event is August 5, 2020.

Please see the following FLYER for more information:
https://bit.ly/JFS_HelpMeLearn2020
